name: Avoid The Void - Puzzle Game
description:
Avoid the Void is simple yet addictive arcade style puzzle game, the patten and colour combinations make for a unique gameplay experience that anyone can enjoy.

There's no spikes, pits or any other deadly obstacles to avoid or even geometry to jump just the never ending void, so watch where you tap as just one wrong move and you could be lost to the void forever.


HOW TO PLAY

Tap the coloured tiles that match the colour of the surrounding border. The colour will switch to another once all the current ones are gone.
Clear a level by removing all coloured tiles within the stage.

There is no time limit but the faster you clear each tile the better your combo will become increasing your points bonus.

If you touch the black void at any time its game over, so...

AVOID the VOID

GAME MODES

Normal Mode – Each level you clear speeds up the colour tiles and changes their direction the higher you get the harder it gets, how far can you go?

Zen Mode – Relax and lose yourself in this chilled out game mode there is no levels, no speed increases or direction changes to deal with.
